thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris Arc de Triomphe Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Surprisingly hip hotel
thread.title_full: Surprisingly hip hotel - Review of Renaissance Paris Arc de Triomphe Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: UrbanFox99
title: Surprisingly hip hotel
text: Pleasantly surprised by this hotel. It has a cool, hip feel about it and is literally 2 min walk from the Arc. The bar and breakfast area has a Soho look and feel to it and there was a good selection of food available. The rooms were bigger than I would expect with very comfortable beds. All in all, a good choice for business in Paris.
